text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly addresses the US law analysis and states: \"Statutory damages of $750\u2013$30,000 per work infringed (up to $150,000 for willful infringement) under \u00a7 504(c), if registration was timely.\" This directly satisfies the requirement that the response states the copyright holder could choose statutory damages in the American system.", "criterion_id": "661ecb64-b694-403f-97ea-781b4eca98f4"}
